name: Graveyard Farmer (Tony Chen)
description:
Farm, Harvest (or not), Be a bad farmer and let plants die, Kill zombie plants. Repeat :)

Plant vegetables/ to gain money. Keep them alive or they will come for you

Press X: To Interact

Press B: To Attack

Press Y: To Open the Inventory

Walk next to dirt: Interact to plant potatoes/carrots/tomatoes

Walk next to plant: Interact to water and harvest when fully grown 

When the night comes, the dead plants will rise. Use your shovel to defeat them.
